title.narrative: UNCDF Financing Inclusive Digital Economy in Zambia
UNCDF Zambia digital finansiering och tjänster

description.narrative: Insatsen avser stöd för att tillgängliggöra finansiering för småföretag som använder digitala betalningsmetoder. Denna förberedande insats syftar till att utveckla en facilitet för lån, från zambiska banker och mikrofinansföretag, till mikro-, små- och medelstora företag som använder digitala betalningsmöjligheter och som erbjuder tjänster som förbättrar livsvillkoren för fattiga människor till rimliga kostnader. Insatsen ska ge underlag inför en beredning med syfte att utreda förutsättningarna för eventuellt beslut om en garanti från Sida. Dessutom ska kunskapsstöd ges till företagen inför låneansökningsprocessen.

The contribution involves support for increased access to finance for service providers using digital payments. This preparatory contribution aims at developing a loan guarantee facility with Zambian banks and financial institutions, for loans to companies that offer services that can improve poor people's livelihoods, through digital payment methods and at affordable costs. The contribution shall provide a basis for Sida's assessment of the conditions for a potential guarantee from Sida. The contribution also involves support for the application process to potential borrowers.

The main results expected during this extension phase are the following: - The proposal for cooperation between UNCDF and Sweden will be finalized and approved. - The technical (re-guarantee agreement) and programmatic (technical assistance agreement) cooperation will be formalized. - Final versions of the guarantee term sheet and portfolio guarantee agreement to be signed between UNCDF / Sweden and the PFIs are in place. - PFIs participating in the LG and TA program are extensively assessed, selected, agreements signed, and formal onboarding process is completed. - All the tools to be used in implementing and managing the LG and TA facility are in place. - The additional staff needed for implementation of the LG and TA program are in place.

tag.narrative: 17.3 - Mobilisera additionella finansiella resurser till utvecklingsländerna från många olika källor.
17.3 - Mobilize additional financial resources for developing countries from multiple sources.
8.10 - Strengthen the capacity of domestic financial institutions to encourage and expand access to banking, insurance and financial services for all.
8.10 - Stärka de inhemska finansinstitutens kapacitet att främja och utöka tillgången till bank- och försäkringstjänster samt finansiella tjänster för alla.
8.2 - Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors.
8.2 - Uppnå högre ekonomisk produktivitet genom diversifiering, teknisk uppgradering och innovation, bland annat genom att fokusera på sektorer med högt förädlingsvärde och hög arbetsintensitet.

8.3 - Främja utvecklingsinriktad politik som stöder produktiv verksamhet, skapande av anständiga arbetstillfällen, företagande, kreativitet och innovation samt uppmuntra att mikroföretag liksom små och medelstora företag växer och blir en del av den formella ekonomin, bland annat genom tillgång till finansiella tjänster.

8.3 - Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services.
8.6 - By 2020, substantially reduce the proportion of youth not in employment, education or training.
8.6 - Till 2020 väsentligt minska den andel ungdomar som varken arbetar eller studerar.

9.3 - Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets.

9.3 - Öka tillgången för småskaliga industriföretag och andra företag, i synnerhet i utvecklingsländerna, till finansiella tjänster, inklusive överkomliga krediter, samt deras integrering i värdekedjor och marknader.

title.narrative: Decision on Contribution UNCDF Digital Bridge

description.narrative:
To date this phase of the contribution has produced the following results:
1. Market Scoping
2. Proposal for Phase 2 including the set up of a guarantee and technical assistance
The Market Scoping included a questionnaire sent out to 19 financial service providers, resulting in 12 responses. It also included an assessment of the demand side (i.e. the demand from MSMEs for financial services) and a review of other loan guarantee providers. The study included recommendations for the design of the guarantee and the accompanying technical assistance.
The proposal further developed the recommendations from the market scoping and developed specific parameters for the guarantee and the technical assistance. The proposal was developed in parallel to the term sheet prepared by the Sida Guarantee Unit. Both documents have since been used as a basis for discussions between UNCDF, Sida, and the Embassy.
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
